detaileddescription.para: Passive scanning.
Active scanning.

briefdescription.para: Type of scan.

detaileddescription.para: Filter accept list not used, Decision PDUs ignored, Peer_Address and Type used.
Filter accept list used, Decision PDUs ignored, Peer_Address and Type ignored.
Filter accept list not used, Only decision PDUs, Peer_Address and Type ignored.
Filter accept list used, All PDUs, Peer_Address and Type ignored.
Filter accept list used, Decision PDUs processed, Peer_Address and Type ignored.
Total number of filter policies.

briefdescription.para: Init filter policy.

detaileddescription.para: Primary filtering bit.
Extended filtering bit.
Filter all PDUs.
Filter decisions only.

briefdescription.para: Scan filter policy.

detaileddescription.para: Use advSID, advAddrType and advAddr to filter.
Use the periodic advertiser list.

briefdescription.para: Periodic scan filter policy.

detaileddescription.para: Duplicate filtering disabled.
Duplicate filtering enabled.
Duplicate filtering enabled, reset for each scan period.

briefdescription.para: Scan filter modes for duplicate report.

detaileddescription.para: Connectable undirected advertising (ADV_IND).
Connectable directed advertising (ADV_DIRECT_IND).
Scannable undirected advertising (ADV_SCAN_IND).
Non connectable undirected advertising (ADV_NONCONN_IND).
Scan Response (SCAN_RSP).

briefdescription.para: Advertising report event types.

detaileddescription.para: Enable bit for periodic advertising enable command.
Enable bit for periodic advertising ADI inclusion.

briefdescription.para: Periodic advertising enable bits.

detaileddescription.para: Enable periodic scan reports.
Enable filtering by ADI of periodic advertising trains.

briefdescription.para: Periodic scan receive enable bits.

chanMap

pParam

briefdescription.para: Scan enable.

detaileddescription.para:
enable
Set to true to enable scanning, false to disable scanning.
filterDup
Set to true to filter duplicates.
Enable or disable scanning. This function is only used when operating in master role.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t ownAddrType, uint8_t scanFiltPolicy, uint8_t scanPhys, const LlExtScanParam_t param[])

briefdescription.para: Set extended scanning parameters.

detaileddescription.para:
ownAddrType
Address type used by this device.
scanFiltPolicy
Scan filter policy.
scanPhys
Scanning PHYs bitmask.
param
Scanning parameter table indexed by PHY.
Status error code.
Set the extended scan parameters to be used on the primary advertising channel.

memberdef.name: LlSetPeriodicAdvSyncTransParams

briefdescription.para: Set periodic advertising sync transfer parameters.

detaileddescription.para:
connHandle
Connection handle.
mode
Periodic sync advertising sync transfer mode.
skip
The number of periodic advertising packets that can be skipped after a successful receive.
syncTimeout
Synchronization timeout for the periodic advertising.
cteType
Constant tone extension type(Used in AoD/AoA).
Status error code.
Set periodic advertising sync transfer parameters.
